summary: A married woman lets her lover take naked pictures of her. The photos end up in possession of a man who starts blackmailing the couple.
cast: Mariko Okada|Shigeru Tsuyuguchi|Tamotsu Hayakawa|Keiko Natsu|Hiroko Masuda|Aiko Masuda|Sakae Umezu|Yukio Tada|Natsu Setoguchi|Shin'ichi Matsushima|Mitsuhiko Shibata|Hisanobu Ichikawa|Kazumi Higuchi|Shinsuke Ashida
